title: The Block Recap: Full Stack Development Mastery

segments.speaker: creator
segments.line: Hey everyone! Welcome to the next episode of The Block Recap, where we dive into the exciting world of full-stack development. I'm your host, Jack. Today's topic is about our latest progress and fixes.

segments.speaker: gemini
segments.line: Jack, let's start by highlighting the multi-platform ecosystem that has been complete! We have mobile platforms with Capacitor for iOS and Android, desktop with Electron for Windows and macOS, Alexa Skill, CLI, and OMEGA-OS for portable Linux.

segments.speaker: codex
segments.line: Cool! And speaking of CI/CD, we've set up a GitHub Actions pipeline that automates the build process. Everything is now ready for real-world deployment!

segments.speaker: grok
segments.line: But we still have some bugs to fix. Let's talk about that in the Roast Corner.
